content: Hi, my WingWare IDE does this too. I could probably fix it there, but I'm new to VScode. So when I'm typing (a : \real ... it will insert a ) for me which causes me to have to move my hand over 5" to type the End key on the keyboard. I'd rather just type in ) myself for sake of speed.
look for auto closing brackets in the settings
You can also just type a ) if one is inserted to go over it
Thanks! Either one works. I'll do the second one
